name: Circled of Perpetual Flame
description: Forged in the underworld, the flame contained by this circlet is a tribute to your raw power and aggression!

name: Arcanist's Axe
description: Imbued with arcane runes, this eternally sharpened axe whispers dark portents.

name: Ravager's Scimitar
description: The barbaric Ravagers of Ravenspire use these swords to inspire fear in their enemies

name: Doomshard Staff
description: The powerful but unstable doomshards in this staf give off a strange luminescent glow.

name: Executor's Shield
description: Imported from Stonehelm, this shield once belonged to the fearless Order of the Executor.

name: Dragonmaw Axe
description: This deadly axe is imbued with dragonstone, charging it with great power.

name: Ravenspire Sword
description: An immaculately-crafted blade used by the king's guard in the Eastern lands of Ravenspire.

name: Lunar Crescent
description: Crafted by the Order of Luna, this staff channels the power of the moon.

name: Carapace Shield
description: Made from the carapace of a deadly sea creature, this shield is charged with powerful ward.
